title: I stand with DotEleven. Riot needs to answer.
body:
My boycott of Riot Games continues, and I will continue to remind people of what they did at PAX. Fighting sexism with more sexism is not ok. It's not ok to treat women in the workplace the way they have been, and it's not ok to exclude people from a paid event, at the last minute, because of their gender.

If it would be wrong to say "no blacks" or "no women or non binaries" or "no Jews allowed" then it's just as wrong to say "no men allowed".

Riot. Answer for your crimes.
